entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army is mentioned as 'DUMBLEDORE'S ARMY' in the title of the section.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as one of the main characters, clutching a piece of parchment and using magic to reveal a map.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned on the map as being on the second floor.

entities.name: mrs. norris
entities.description: Mrs. Norris is mentioned on the map as being on the fourth floor.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is asked about by Hermione and revealed to be in her office.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as one of the main characters, asking about Umbridge.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as having described a place to Harry.

relationships.description: Harry reveals that Filch is on the second floor using the map.
Harry reveals that Mrs. Norris is on the fourth floor using the map.
Harry reveals that Umbridge is in her office using the map.
